name: Guini Gug
description:
Here is the code : https://github.com/baeriswyln/lvlup-2023

🚩 Introduction

This game is a submission to the LvlUp Game Jam #9 for the "BonneQuestion" group. It was made in two days.

📋 Short description

The players are cowboys are cowgirls that must shoot the others to win the "the Good" title.

There is turns when the players can choose bonus or malus to rebalance the forces. The game is finished when one of the player has reached 3 games win !

🎮 Controls

  • Mouse to start the game
  • One keyboard to control the players : the keys for each players are described in the game (according to a QWERTZ keyboard)

👤 Players

Min 2 players and maximum 6 players.

  • Yellow - Jesse Lasso: uses the pistol
  • Orange - Wyatt Granger: uses the long range gun
  • Red - Silas McCoy: uses the shotgun
  • Blue - Cheyenne Parker: uses the pistol
  • Purple - Savannah West: uses the long range gun
  • Green - Abigail Yates: uses the shotgun

🔫 Guns

  • Pistol - Colt 1850 : the range, the firing rate and the damage are medium
  • Shotgun - Wyatt Earp Double barrel shotgun 1868 : small range, multiple bullets that makes less damage
  • LongRange - Winchester 1890 : small firing rate, greater firing range et high damage

💰 Credits

This game was made by :

  • Audergon Vincent : player animation in game, player status in game, transition animation, music
  • Baeriswyl Nicolas : code
  • Felder Camille : use of AI, graphics

Software used :

  • Unity 2022.2.7f1 for the code and game rendering
  • Blender for the 3D (player and background)
  • Affinity Designer on iPad and on Desktop for the graphics
  • FL Studio for the musics
  • MidJourney for most of the assets and the final name
  • ChatGPT for the players names and for the basic idea of the game name
  • Trello, OneNote and Github for the project management

Thanks to the organizers of the GameJam !

➡️ Have fun 😊
